meanings.definition: One of the two surfaces of a flat object
meanings.sent1: The book cover has colorful sides.
meanings.sent2: Please write your name on the sides of the paper.
meanings.sent3: The sides of the ruler got into an argument about who is longer.
meanings.sent4: Her smile brightened up both sides of the room.
meanings.sent5: The sides of the coin show different symbols.

meanings.definition: A position or attitude taken in a conflict or debate
meanings.sent1: Both sides of the argument presented valid points.
meanings.sent2: It's important to understand all sides before making a decision.
meanings.sent3: The sides in the debate decided to settle it with a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: She always takes the side of kindness in any disagreement.
meanings.sent5: The sides in the conflict finally reached a compromise.

meanings.definition: The two parts of a person's body from the shoulders to the hips
meanings.sent1: She held the baby on her sides.
meanings.sent2: Exercise can help tone your sides.
meanings.sent3: His sides started dancing when he heard his favorite song.
meanings.sent4: The weightlifter felt the strain in his sides after lifting heavy weights.
meanings.sent5: The sides of the athlete were sore after the intense workout.

meanings.definition: A dish served with the main course of a meal
meanings.sent1: I'll have fries on the side.
meanings.sent2: The steak came with a side of vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The side salad decided it wanted to be the main course.
meanings.sent4: The side dish of rice complemented the curry perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The side of garlic bread was a delicious addition to the meal.
